meanings.definition: Buy back something that one has previously sold.
meanings.sent1: She repurchases her old books from the bookstore.
meanings.sent2: The company repurchases its shares from investors.
meanings.sent3: John decided to repurchase his childhood toy for sentimental reasons.
meanings.sent4: The artist repurchases his paintings to keep them in his private collection.
meanings.sent5: The farmer repurchases his land to expand his agricultural business.

meanings.definition: The act of buying back something that one has previously sold.
meanings.sent1: The repurchases of antique furniture have increased this year.
meanings.sent2: The company's repurchases of its own products are part of its marketing strategy.
meanings.sent3: The sudden surge in repurchases at the thrift store surprised the staff.
meanings.sent4: Her repurchases of designer handbags are becoming a hobby.
meanings.sent5: The repurchases of rare coins at the auction were highly competitive.
